name: new years mini game
description:
Hey, so. I made this mini game roughly in 2 days since other days I was goofing off. This is just a some "Sonic" mini game I made for new years. I wanted to add more but no time.

You have a health bar

Custom boss.

music from sonic games

there are no levels, just a boss and stuff

This is a very very simple mini game I wanted to release for new years because why not. It's not all that good but just a silly game. :3

credits to hidden palace stuff: https://www.deviantart.com/sonicdash57/art/Sonic-3-and-Knuckles-Hidden-Palace-Zo...
